INSERT INTO TB_ProdtPay (DutyYn, StudyYn, SubjYn, ImgYn, AcuntId, ProdId, ProdType, Price, PayDt, OrgId, TurnId, PayYn, InsId, InsDt, UptId, UptDt) VALUES (#{dutyYn}, #{studyYn}, #{subjYn}, #{imgYn}, #{acuntId}, #{prodId}, #{prodType}, #{price}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{orgId}, #{turnId}, #{payYn}, #{insId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{uptId}, #{uptDt})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS payId
mapper.select: SELECT p.PayId, p.DutyYn, p.StudyYn, p.SubjYn, p.ImgYn, p.AcuntId, p.prodType, c.CdNm AS prodTypeName, s.PersnNm, p.Price, p.PayDt, p.OrgId, p.TurnId, p.PayYn, p.InsId, p.InsDt, p.UptId, p.UptDt FROM TB_ProdtPay p INNER JOIN TB_Cd c ON p.ProdType = c.Cd INNER JOIN TB_Acunt a ON p.AcuntId = a.AcuntId INNER JOIN TB_Persn s ON a.UserId = s.PersnId WHERE PayYn = 'Y'
